title: Add visual editor for blog posts
description: Web-based visual editor for blog posts, served at /manage on the same Netlify deployment. Static SPA using GitHub OAuth for auth and GitHub Contents API for read/write. Each save = git commit (already on remote), push = live via Netlify. Markdown editor with structured TOML frontmatter fields. Supports per-page custom CSS/JS fields.
